span.p:
Gateway Persistence
gateway-persistence.ts
Unified logging interface
Dual repository pattern
Audit trail coordination

div.style: color: rgb(6, 95, 70) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:

repository/
SQLite/PostgreSQL
Transaction logging
Session state
Query interface

div.style: color: rgb(6, 95, 70) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:

repository/

Immutable proofs

Cryptographic hashes
